<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A module pass for msan instrumentation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Instruments functions to detect unitialized reads. This function pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// inserts calls to runtime library functions. If the functions aren&#39;t declared</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// yet, the pass inserts the declarations. Otherwise the existing globals are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
